altTitles.ja: よつばと! Try! Try! Try!

description.en:
Kiyohiko Azuma's Try! Try! Try! follows the adventures of a weird girl named Yotsuba whose bizarre antics baffle her friends and her father.   
The characters in this comic later went on to appear in the monthly Yotsubato! serial manga currently running in Dengeki Daioh magazine.
description.fr: Kiyohiko Azuma's Try ! Essayez ! Try ! suit les aventures d'une fille bizarre nommée Yotsuba dont les singeries étranges déconcertent ses amis et son père. Les personnages de cette bande dessinée ont par la suite été publiés dans le mensuel Yotsubato ! serial manga actuellement publié dans le magazine Dengeki Daioh.
description.pt-br: Escrito por Kiyohiko Azuma Try! Try! Try! segue as aventuras de uma estranha garota chamada Yotsuba, que apronta uma atrás da outra envolvendo seu pai e amigos, os deixando em situações complicadas. Os personagens cômicos desta one-shot passou a figurar no Yotsubato mensal! Um mangá atualmente em execução no revista Dengeki Daioh.
description.ru:
Всеми любимая Ёцуба снова с нами. Непоседливый ребёнок ни секунды не сидит. И в этот раз её ждут встречи со старыми друзьями, железнодорожное развлечение и много всего интересного.

---

(Source: [Golden Wind](http://goldenwind.ucoz.org/publ/try_try_try/9-1-0-37))
